text: Need Victoria Carter for Harvey Norman camp. Budget around $29,041, looking for 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 2 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x 15-second TikTok. 2 week exclusivity from other electronics brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
